command.name: vendor-update
command.summary: Update all the libraries installed in the ./vendor/ directory.

option.name: optionaldeps
option.doc: Automatically download and install all optional dependencies

option.name: force
option.doc: Force the installation to proceed independent of errors. USE SPARINGLY.

argument.name: vendor_dir
argument.doc: path to the vendor directory to manage

command.doc:
This command scans all existing dependencies in the vendor directory and upgrades them to their latest available versions.
Dependencies are examined by looking at the package.xml file and the vendor registry.
